name: A Bird Story
descr: 关于这款游戏Note:This is not To the Moon's sequel, but rather a small experimental project.---------------------------------------------------------------------------From the creator of To the Moon and Finding Paradise: Asimple, wordless 1-hour shortabout a boy who found an injured bird, told through a blur between reality and imagination.A Bird Story is aninteractive pixel animationwith the sole purpose of telling a simple story. It is a standalone narrative, with its own beginning and ending.Key FeaturesA story-driven experience with no dialoguesA mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aestheticsAn original soundtrack tailored to the narrativeAn espresso execution with no time drains
